Toska-Bano&#39;k - th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi v\u1ec1 ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may m\u1eb7c v\u1edbi h\u01a1n 50 n\u0103m kinh nghi\u1ec7m \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ef1 tin t\u01b0\u1edfng t\u1eeb ph&iacute;a kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng trong v&agrave; ngo&agrave;i Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng nhu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch nhanh ch&oacute;ng, hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i Toska - Bano&#39;k \u0111&atilde; m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng th&ecirc;m c&aacute;c c\u01a1 s\u1edf s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; b&aacute;n h&agrave;ng t\u1ea1i \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam..<span style=\"display: none;\">&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>","icon":"1593424329_81-1.jpg","duongdantin":"datafiles","seo_name":"\/gioi-thieu","tenbaiviet_en":"INTRODUCTION","noidung_en":"<p>The quality of products and customer service are the two key foundations for the success of a company. Toska-Bano&#39;k - the world&#39;s leading brand of garment accessories with over 50 years experience has gained trust from the customers all around the world. In order to serve the needs of the world market quickly, Toska - Bano&#39;k has now expanded its production facilities and sales agents in South East Asia. In July 2014, Van Nang Banok Co., Ltd. was established and operated based on the &nbsp;&quot; Made in Viet Nam with Japanese Standard &quot;. Van Nang Banok Co., Ltd is specializing in supplying garment accessories such as string fasteners, tagpin with a variety of materials and models.We are committed to the quality as well as the accompanying criteria with the aim of providing customers with the best products in the garment accessories market<\/p>","tenbaiviet_cn":"","noidung_cn":"","p1_cn":"","opt":"0","p1_vi":"V\u1ea0N N\u0102NG BANOK","p1_en":"VAN NANG-BANOK","tenbaiviet_jp":"","noidung_jp":"","p1_jp":"","showhi":"1","is_mota":"1","is_hinhanh":"1","is_lienket":"1","is_hinhanh_size":"(540px x 370px)"}]
